remarks: The difference of two infinite group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmssub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmssub.p $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
tsmssub.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmssub.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopGrp ) $.
tsmssub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmssub.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmssub.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
tsmssub.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( G tsums F ) ) $.
tsmssub.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( G tsums H ) ) $.
tsmssub $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) e. ( G tsums ( F oF .- H ) ) ) $.
